DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase I, open-label, single-dose study to evaluate the pharmacokinetics and safety of LDT600 in pediatric and adolescent patients with chronic hepatitis B infection.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Single-Dose Telbivudine in Children and Adolescents With Chronic Hepatitis B
